concept.title: Built-in _stats Function
concept.shortdesc: The built-in _stats reduce function produces statistical calculations for the input data.

conbody.p: As with the _sum function, the corresponding value in the emit call should be a number. The generated statistics include the sum, count, minimum ( min ), maximum ( max ) and sum squared ( sumsqr ) of the input rows.
For example, using the sales data, a slightly truncated output at group level one shows the same fields in the output value for each of the reduced output rows.
